trans-unit.source: .tree() returns the spanning tree of the polyhedron, from which one can infer the faces’ centers, polygons, shared edges etc.
trans-unit.target: 。tree（）返回多面体的生成树，从中可以推断出面的中心，多边形，共享边等。

trans-unit.source: .value. The first value x0 should typically be greater than zero.
.value. The returned geometry objects are typically passed to d3.geoPath to display, using null or d3.geoIdentity as the associated projection. See also d3.contours.
trans-unit.target: 。值。返回的几何对象通常使用null或d3.geoIdentity作为关联的投影传递到d3.geoPath进行显示。另请参见d3.contours。

trans-unit.source: 4.0 also introduces a new timer.restart method for restarting timers, for replacing the callback of a running timer, or for changing its delay or reference time. Unlike timer.stop followed by d3.timer, timer.restart maintains the invocation priority of an existing timer: it guarantees that the order of invocation of active timers remains the same. The d3.timer.flush method has been renamed to d3.timerFlush.
trans-unit.target: 4.0还引入了新的timer .restart方法，用于重新启动计时器，替换正在运行的计时器的回调或更改其延迟或参考时间。不同于定时器 .stop其次d3.timer，定时器 .restart保持现有的计时器的调用优先级：它保证了活动的定时器的调用顺序保持不变。d3.timer.flush方法已重命名为d3.timerFlush。

trans-unit.source: 4.0 also ships new Cubehelix schemes, including Dave Green’s default and a cyclical rainbow inspired by Matteo Niccoli:
trans-unit.target: 4.0还提供了新的Cubehelix方案，包括Dave Green的默认方案和受Matteo Niccoli启发的周期性彩虹：

trans-unit.source: 4.0 fixes numerous bugs in the monotone curve implementation, and introduces d3.curveMonotoneY; this is like d3.curveMonotoneX, except it requires that the input points are monotone in y rather than x, such as for a vertically-oriented line chart. The new d3.curveNatural produces a natural cubic spline. The default β for d3.curveBundle is now 0.85, rather than 0.7, matching the values used by Holten. 4.0 also has a more robust implementation of arc padding; see arc.padAngle and arc.padRadius.
trans-unit.target: 4.0修复了单调曲线实现中的许多错误，并引入了d3.curveMonotoneY；就像d3.curveMonotoneX一样，除了它要求输入点在y而不是x中是单调的，例如对于垂直方向的折线图。新的d3.curveNatural产生自然的三次样条曲线。默认β为d3.curveBundle现在是0.85，而不是0.7，通过配套使用的值霍尔滕。 4.0还具有更强大的电弧填充实现；参见arc .padAngle和arc .padRadius。

trans-unit.source: 4.0 fixes the interpretation of the cardinal spline tension parameter, which is now specified as cardinal.tension and defaults to zero for a uniform Catmull–Rom spline; a tension of one produces a linear curve. The first and last segments of basis and cardinal curves have also been fixed! The undocumented interpolate.reverse field has been removed. Curves can define different behavior for toplines and baselines by counting the sequence of curve.lineStart within curve.areaStart. See the d3.curveStep implementation for an example.
trans-unit.target: 4.0修复了基数样条线张力参数的解释，该参数现在指定为基数。张力，对于统一的Catmull-Rom样条线，默认为零；一个张力产生一条线性曲线。基础曲线和基数曲线的第一个和最后一个分段也已固定！未记录的插值 .reverse字段已被删除。通过计算曲线 .areaStart中的曲线 .lineStart的序列，曲线可以为顶线和基线定义不同的行为。有关示例，请参见d3.curveStep实现。

trans-unit.source: 4.0 introduces a new curve API for specifying how line and area shapes interpolate between data points. The line.interpolate and area.interpolate methods have been replaced with line.curve and area.curve. Curves are implemented using the curve interface rather than as a function that returns an SVG path data string; this allows curves to render to either SVG or Canvas. In addition, line.curve and area.curve now take a function which instantiates a curve for a given context, rather than a string. The full list of equivalents:
trans-unit.target: 4.0引入了新的曲线API，用于指定线形和面形如何在数据点之间进行插值。该行 .interpolate和地区 .interpolate方法已被替换线 .curve和地区 .curve。曲线是使用曲线接口实现的，而不是作为返回SVG路径数据字符串的函数来实现的；这允许曲线渲染为SVG或Canvas。另外，line .curve和area .curve现在具有一个函数，该函数实例化给定上下文而不是字符串的曲线。等效项的完整列表：

trans-unit.source: 4.0 introduces a new symbol type API. Symbol types are passed to symbol.type in place of strings. The equivalents are:
trans-unit.target: 4.0引入了新的符号类型API。符号类型将代替字符串传递到symbol .type。等效项是：

trans-unit.source: Arrays (Statistics, Search, Iterables, Sets, Transformations, Histograms, Interning)
trans-unit.target: 数组（统计量，搜索，可迭代数，集，变换，直方图，实习）
数组（统计信息，搜索，变换，直方图）
集合（对象，地图，集合，嵌套）

trans-unit.source: Continuous (Linear, Power, Log, Identity, Time)
trans-unit.target: 连续的（线性，幂，对数，恒等，时间）

trans-unit.source: Continuous (Linear, Power, Log, Identity, Time, Radial)
trans-unit.target: 连续的（线性，幂，对数，同一性，时间，径向）

trans-unit.source: Geographies (Paths, Projections, Spherical Math, Spherical Shapes, Streams, Transforms)
trans-unit.target: 地理（路径，投影，球面数学，球面形状，流，变换）

trans-unit.source: Groups and reduces the specified iterable of values into an InternMap from key to value. For example, given some data:
trans-unit.target: 从键到值将指定的可迭代值分组并减少到InternMap中。例如，给定一些数据：

trans-unit.source: map.entries returns an array of {key, value} objects, not an iterator of [key, value].
trans-unit.target: map.entries返回一个{key，value}对象的数组，而不是[key，value]的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: map.size is a method, not a property; also, there’s map.empty.
trans-unit.target: map.size是一种方法，而不是属性；另外，还有map.empty。
投影（方位角，合成，圆锥，圆柱）

trans-unit.source: Scales (Continuous, Sequential, Diverging, Quantize, Ordinal)
trans-unit.target: 尺度（连续，顺序，发散，量化，有序）

trans-unit.source: Selects the root element, document.documentElement. This function can also be used to test for selections (instanceof d3.selection) or to extend the selection prototype. For example, to add a method to check checkboxes:
trans-unit.target: 选择根元素 document.documentElement 。此函数还可以用于测试选择（ instanceof d3.selection ）或扩展选择原型。例如，向复选框添加方法：

trans-unit.source: Selections (Selecting, Modifying, Data, Events, Control, Local Variables, Namespaces)
trans-unit.target: 选择（选择，修改，数据，事件，控件，局部变量，命名空间）

trans-unit.source: set.size is a method, not a property; also, there’s set.empty.
trans-unit.target: set.size是一种方法，而不是属性；另外，还有set.empty。

trans-unit.source: Shapes (Arcs, Pies, Lines, Areas, Curves, Links, Symbols, Stacks)
trans-unit.target: 形状（圆弧，饼图，直线，区域，曲线，链接，符号，堆栈）
树状图（树状图平铺）

trans-unit.source: Drag events now expose an event.on method for registering temporary listeners for duration of the current drag gesture; these listeners can capture state for the current gesture, such as the thing being dragged. A new event.active property lets you detect whether multiple (multitouch) drag gestures are active concurrently. The dragstart and dragend events have been renamed to start and end. By default, drag behaviors now ignore right-clicks intended for the context menu; use drag.filter to control which events are ignored. The drag behavior also ignores emulated mouse events on iOS. The drag behavior now consumes handled events, making it easier to combine with other interactive behaviors such as zooming.
trans-unit.target: 现在，拖动事件公开了一个事件 .on方法，用于在当前拖动手势的持续时间内注册临时侦听器；这些侦听器可以捕获当前手势的状态，例如被拖动的事物。新的事件 .active属性可让您检测多个（多点触摸）拖动手势是否同时处于活动状态。该的dragstart和dragend事件已更名为开始和结束。默认情况下，拖动行为现在会忽略上下文菜单中的右键单击；使用拖动 .filter控制哪些事件被忽略。拖动行为还会忽略iOS上的模拟鼠标事件。现在，拖动行为将消耗已处理的事件，从而使其更易于与其他交互式行为（例如zooming）结合使用。

trans-unit.source: force.initialize is now passed a random source.
d3.scaleDiverging can now accept a range array in place of an interpolator.
trans-unit.target: d3.scaleDiverging现在可以代替插值器接受范围数组。

trans-unit.source: diverging.range can now be used to set the interpolator.
trans-unit.target: 分歧.range现在可以用来设置插值器。

trans-unit.source: Log tick formatting now assumes a default count of ten, not Infinity, if not specified. Log scales with domains that span many powers (such as from 1e+3 to 1e+29) now return only one tick per power rather than returning base ticks per power. Non-linear quantitative scales are slightly more accurate.
trans-unit.target: 现在，日志刻度格式假定默认计数为十，如果未指定，则为无穷大。现在，具有跨越多个幂的域的对数刻度（例如从1e + 3到1e + 29）每幂仅返回一个刻度，而不是每幂返回基本刻度。非线性定量标度稍微更准确。

trans-unit.source: Sequential scales, are a new class of scales with a fixed output interpolator instead of a range. Typically these scales are used to implement continuous sequential or diverging color schemes. Inspired by Matplotlib’s new perceptually-motived colormaps, 4.0 now features viridis, inferno, magma, plasma interpolators for use with sequential scales. Using d3.quantize, these interpolators can also be applied to quantile, quantize and threshold scales.
trans-unit.target: 顺序标尺是一种具有固定输出插值器而不是范围的新标尺。通常，这些刻度用于实现连续的顺序或发色方案。受Matplotlib的新型感性色彩图的启发，4.0现在具有viridis，inferno，magma，等离子内插器，可与顺序刻度配合使用。使用d3.quantize，这些插值器也可以应用于分位数，量化和阈值标度。

trans-unit.source: d3.scaleSequential can now accept a range array in place of an interpolator.
trans-unit.target: d3.scaleSequential现在可以代替插值器接受范围数组。

trans-unit.source: sequential.range can now be used to set the interpolator.
trans-unit.target: 顺序.range现在可以用来设置插值器。

trans-unit.source: histogram - compute the histogram for the given array of samples.
trans-unit.target: 直方图 -计算给定样本数组的直方图。

trans-unit.source: d3.ascending - compute the natural order of two values.
d3.bisect - binary search for a value in a sorted array.
trans-unit.target: d3.bisect-在排序数组中二进制搜索值。

trans-unit.source: d3.bisectLeft - binary search for a value in a sorted array.
trans-unit.target: d3.bisectLeft-在排序数组中二进制搜索值。

trans-unit.source: d3.bisectRight - binary search for a value in a sorted array.
trans-unit.target: d3.bisectRight-在排序数组中二进制搜索值。

trans-unit.source: d3.bisector - bisect using an accessor or comparator.
d3.cross - compute the Cartesian product of two arrays.
d3.descending - compute the natural order of two values.
d3.deviation - compute the standard deviation of an array of numbers.
d3.extent - compute the minimum and maximum value in an array.
trans-unit.target: d3.extent-计算数组中的最小值和最大值。
d3.histogram-创建一个新的直方图生成器。

trans-unit.source: histogram.domain - specify the interval of observable values.
trans-unit.target: 直方图 .domain-指定可观察值的间隔。

trans-unit.source: histogram.thresholds - specify how values are divided into bins.
histogram.value - specify a value accessor for each sample.
trans-unit.target: histogram .value-为每个样本指定一个值访问器。

trans-unit.source: d3.max - compute the maximum value in an array.
d3.mean - compute the arithmetic mean of an array of numbers.
trans-unit.target: d3.mean-计算数字数组的算术平均值。

trans-unit.source: d3.median - compute the median of an array of numbers (the 0.5-quantile).
trans-unit.target: d3.median-计算数字数组的中位数（0.5分位数）。

trans-unit.source: d3.merge - merge multiple arrays into one array.
trans-unit.target: d3.merge-将多个阵列合并为一个阵列。

trans-unit.source: d3.min - compute the minimum value in an array.
d3.pairs - create an array of adjacent pairs of elements.
d3.permute - reorder an array of elements according to an array of indexes.
trans-unit.target: d3.permute-根据索引数组对元素数组重新排序。

trans-unit.source: d3.quantile - compute a quantile for a sorted array of numbers.
d3.range - generate a range of numeric values.
d3.scan - linear search for an element using a comparator.
d3.shuffle - randomize the order of an array.
d3.sum - compute the sum of an array of numbers.
d3.tickIncrement - generate representative values from a numeric interval.
d3.tickStep - generate representative values from a numeric interval.
d3.ticks - generate representative values from a numeric interval.
d3.variance - compute the variance of an array of numbers.
d3.zip - transpose a variable number of arrays.
axis - generate an axis for the given selection.
d3.axisBottom - create a new bottom-oriented axis generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.axisBottom-创建一个新的面向底部的轴生成器。

trans-unit.source: d3.axisLeft - create a new left-oriented axis generator.
d3.axisRight - create a new right-oriented axis generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.axisRight-创建一个新的面向右的轴生成器。

trans-unit.source: d3.axisTop - create a new top-oriented axis generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.axisTop-创建一个新的面向顶部的轴生成器。

trans-unit.source: axis.tickArguments - customize how ticks are generated and formatted.
trans-unit.target: axis .tickArguments-自定义刻度线的生成和格式。

trans-unit.source: axis.tickPadding - set the padding between ticks and labels.
trans-unit.target: axis .tickPadding-设置刻度和标签之间的填充。

trans-unit.source: axis.tickSize - set the size of the ticks.
axis.tickSizeInner - set the size of inner ticks.
axis.tickSizeOuter - set the size of outer (extent) ticks.
axis.ticks - customize how ticks are generated and formatted.
trans-unit.target: axis .ticks-自定义刻度的生成和格式。

trans-unit.source: brush - apply the brush to a selection.
trans-unit.target: 画笔 -将画笔应用于所选内容。

trans-unit.source: d3.brush - create a new two-dimensional brush.
d3.brushSelection - get the brush selection for a given node.
d3.brushX - create a brush along the x-dimension.
d3.brushY - create a brush along the y-dimension.
brush.filter - control which input events initiate brushing.
brush.handleSize - set the size of the brush handles.
chord - compute the layout for the given matrix.

trans-unit.target: 功能区 -生成功能区形状。

trans-unit.source: d3.chord - create a new chord layout.
chord.padAngle - set the padding between adjacent groups.
chord.sortChords - define the chord order across groups.
chord.sortSubgroups - define the source and target order within groups.
d3.ribbon - create a ribbon shape generator.
ribbon.endAngle - set the ribbon source or target end angle.
ribbon.radius - set the ribbon source or target radius.
ribbon.startAngle - set the ribbon source or target start angle.
trans-unit.target: ribbon .startAngle-设置色带源或目标起始角度。

trans-unit.source: d3.entries - list the key-value entries of an associative array.
d3.keys - list the keys of an associative array.
d3.map - create a new, empty map.
map.each - call a function for each entry.
map.empty - returns false if the map has at least one entry.
trans-unit.target: map .empty-如果映射至少有一个条目，则返回false。

trans-unit.source: map.entries - get the array of entries (key-values objects).
map.get - get the value for the given key.
map.has - returns true if the map contains the given key.
trans-unit.target: map .has-如果地图包含给定的键，则返回true。

trans-unit.source: map.remove - remove the entry for given key.
map.set - set the value for the given key.
d3.nest - create a new nest generator.
nest.entries - generate the nest, returning an array of key-values tuples.
trans-unit.target: nest .entries-生成嵌套，返回键值元组的数组。

trans-unit.source: nest.key - add a level to the nest hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: nest .key-向嵌套层次结构添加一个级别。

trans-unit.source: nest.map - generate the nest, returning a map.
nest.object - generate the nest, returning an associative array.
trans-unit.target: nest .object-生成嵌套，返回一个关联数组。

trans-unit.source: nest.rollup - specify a rollup function for leaf values.
nest.sortKeys - sort the current nest level by key.
trans-unit.target: nest .sortKeys-按键对当前嵌套级别进行排序。

trans-unit.source: nest.sortValues - sort the leaf nest level by value.
trans-unit.target: nest .sortValues-按值对叶嵌套级别进行排序。

trans-unit.source: d3.set - create a new, empty set.
set.each - call a function for each value.
set.empty - returns true if the set has at least one value.
trans-unit.target: set .empty-如果set具有至少一个值，则返回true。

trans-unit.source: set.has - returns true if the set contains the given value.
trans-unit.target: set .has-如果set包含给定值，则返回true。

trans-unit.source: d3.values - list the values of an associated array.
d3.color - parse the given CSS color specifier.
color.brighter - create a brighter copy of this color.
color.darker - create a darker copy of this color.
color.displayable - returns true if the color is displayable on standard hardware.
trans-unit.target: color .displayable-如果颜色可以在标准硬件上显示，则返回true。

trans-unit.source: color.hex - returns the hexadecimal RGB string representation of this color.
trans-unit.target: color .hex-返回此颜色的十六进制RGB字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: color.rgb - compute the RGB equivalent of this color.
color.toString - returns the RGB string representation of this color.
trans-unit.target: color .toString-返回此颜色的RGB字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: d3.gray - create a new Lab gray.
d3.hcl - create a new HCL color.
d3.hsl - create a new HSL color.
d3.lab - create a new Lab color.
d3.lch - create a new HCL color.
d3.rgb - create a new RGB color.
contours - compute the contours for a given grid of values.
trans-unit.target: 轮廓 -计算给定值网格的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: density - estimate the density of a given array of samples.
trans-unit.target: 密度 -估算给定样本阵列的密度。

trans-unit.source: dispatch.apply - dispatch an event to registered listeners.
trans-unit.target: 派遣。应用 -分派事件注册的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: dispatch.call - dispatch an event to registered listeners.
trans-unit.target: 派遣。调用 -将事件调度到注册的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: dispatch.copy - create a copy of a dispatcher.
dispatch.on - register or unregister an event listener.
trans-unit.target: 分派 .on注册或注销事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: drag - apply the drag behavior to a selection.
trans-unit.target: 拖动 -将拖动行为应用于选择。

trans-unit.source: d3.dragDisable - prevent native drag-and-drop and text selection.
d3.dragEnable - enable native drag-and-drop and text selection.

trans-unit.target: drag .filter-忽略一些启动输入事件。
拖动 .touchable-设置触摸支持检测器。

trans-unit.source: event.on - listen for drag events on the current gesture.
trans-unit.target: event .on-在当前手势上监听拖动事件。

trans-unit.source: d3.csvFormat - format the given array of objects as CSV.
trans-unit.target: d3.csvFormat-将给定的对象数组格式化为CSV。

trans-unit.source: d3.csvFormatRows - format the given array of rows as CSV.
d3.csvParse - parse the given CSV string, returning an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: d3.csvParse-解析给定的CSV字符串，返回一个对象数组。

trans-unit.source: d3.csvParseRows - parse the given CSV string, returning an array of rows.
trans-unit.target: d3.csvParseRows-解析给定的CSV字符串，返回一个行数组。

trans-unit.source: d3.dsvFormat - create a new parser and formatter for the given delimiter.
trans-unit.target: d3.dsvFormat-为给定的定界符创建一个新的解析器和格式化程序。

trans-unit.source: dsv.format - format the given array of objects.
trans-unit.target: dsv .format-格式化给定的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: dsv.formatRows - format the given array of rows.
dsv.parse - parse the given string, returning an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: dsv .parse-解析给定的字符串，返回一个对象数组。

trans-unit.source: dsv.parseRows - parse the given string, returning an array of rows.
trans-unit.target: dsv .parseRows-解析给定的字符串，返回一个行数组。

trans-unit.source: d3.tsvFormat - format the given array of objects as TSV.
trans-unit.target: d3.tsvFormat-将给定的对象数组格式化为TSV。

trans-unit.source: d3.tsvFormatRows - format the given array of rows as TSV.
d3.tsvParse - parse the given TSV string, returning an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: d3.tsvParse-解析给定的TSV字符串，返回对象数组。

trans-unit.source: d3.tsvParseRows - parse the given TSV string, returning an array of rows.
trans-unit.target: d3.tsvParseRows-解析给定的TSV字符串，返回一个行数组。

trans-unit.source: ease - ease the given normalized time.
trans-unit.target: 缓解 -缓解给定的标准化时间。

trans-unit.source: d3.easeBackIn - anticipatory easing, like a dancer bending his knees before jumping.
trans-unit.target: d3.easeBackIn-预期的缓动，就像舞者在跳跃前弯曲膝盖。

trans-unit.source: d3.easeBounceIn - bounce easing, like a rubber ball.
d3.easeElasticIn - elastic easing, like a rubber band.
d3.easePolyIn - polynomial easing; raises time to the given power.
trans-unit.target: d3.easePolyIn-多项式缓动；将时间增加到给定的功率。

trans-unit.source: d3.blob - get a file as a blob.
d3.buffer - get a file as an array buffer.
d3.csv - get a comma-separated values (CSV) file.
d3.dsv - get a delimiter-separated values (CSV) file.
d3.text - get a plain text file.
d3.tsv - get a tab-separated values (TSV) file.

trans-unit.target: 中心 .X -设置中心 X -协调。

trans-unit.source: force.initialize - initialize the force with the given nodes.
link.id - link nodes by numeric index or string identifier.
trans-unit.target: link .id-通过数字索引或字符串标识符链接节点。

trans-unit.source: manyBody.distanceMax - limit the force when nodes are far.
manyBody.distanceMin - limit the force when nodes are close.

trans-unit.target: 径向 .X -设定的目标中心 X -协调。
径向 .Y -设定的目标中心 ÿ -协调。

trans-unit.source: simulation.alphaDecay - set the alpha exponential decay rate.
simulation.find - find the closest node to the given position.
trans-unit.target: Simulation .find-查找最接近给定位置的节点。

trans-unit.source: simulation.on - add or remove an event listener.
simulation.restart - reheat and restart the simulation’s timer.
trans-unit.target: 模拟 .restart-重新加热并重新启动模拟计时器。

trans-unit.source: d3.format - alias for locale.format on the default locale.
trans-unit.target: d3.format-默认语言环境上的语言环境 .format的别名。

trans-unit.source: d3.formatPrefix - alias for locale.formatPrefix on the default locale.
trans-unit.target: d3.formatPrefix-默认语言环境中的 .formatPrefix 语言环境的别名。

trans-unit.source: d3.precisionFixed - compute decimal precision for fixed-point notation.
trans-unit.target: d3.precisionFixed-计算定点表示法的十进制精度。

trans-unit.source: d3.precisionPrefix - compute decimal precision for SI-prefix notation.
trans-unit.target: d3.precisionPrefix-计算SI前缀表示法的十进制精度。

trans-unit.source: d3.precisionRound - compute significant digits for rounded notation.
trans-unit.target: d3.precisionRound-计算有效数字以舍入表示法。

trans-unit.source: circle - generate a piecewise circle as a Polygon.
trans-unit.target: 圆 -生成分段圆作为多边形。

trans-unit.source: graticule - generate a MultiLineString of meridians and parallels.
trans-unit.target: 刻度 -生成子午线和平行线的MultiLineString。

trans-unit.source: path - project and render the specified feature.
project - project the specified point from the sphere to the plane.
trans-unit.target: project-将指定点从球体投影到平面。

trans-unit.source: projection - project the specified point from the sphere to the plane.
trans-unit.target: 投影 -将指定点从球体投影到平面。

trans-unit.source: rotation - rotate the given point around the sphere.
trans-unit.target: 旋转 -围绕球旋转给定点。

trans-unit.source: circle.center - specify the circle center in latitude and longitude.
circle.precision - specify the precision of the piecewise circle.
circle.radius - specify the angular radius in degrees.

trans-unit.target: 圆锥 .parallels-设置两个标准平行线。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoAlbers - the Albers equal-area conic projection.
d3.geoAlbersUsa - a composite Albers projection for the United States.
d3.geoArea - compute the spherical area of a given feature.
d3.geoBounds - compute the latitude-longitude bounding box for a given feature.
trans-unit.target: d3.geoBounds-计算给定要素的经纬度边界框。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoCentroid - compute the spherical centroid of a given feature.
d3.geoClipAntimeridian - cuts spherical geometries that cross the antimeridian.
trans-unit.target: d3.geoClipAntimeridian-切割穿过该antimeridian的球形几何形状。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoClipCircle - clips spherical geometries to a small circle.
trans-unit.target: d3.geoClipCircle-将球形几何形状裁剪到一个小圆圈。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoClipRectangle - clips planar geometries to a rectangular viewport.
trans-unit.target: d3.geoClipRectangle-将平面几何裁剪到矩形视口。
d3.geoConicEqualArea-圆锥相等面积（阿尔伯斯）投影。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoContains - test whether a point is inside a given feature.
d3.geoDistance - compute the great-arc distance between two points.
d3.geoIdentity - scale, translate or clip planar geometry.
d3.geoInterpolate - interpolate between two points along a great arc.
trans-unit.target: d3.geoInterpolate-沿一条大弧在两个点之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoLength - compute the length of a line string or the perimeter of a polygon.
trans-unit.target: d3.geoLength-计算线串的长度或多边形的周长。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoPath - create a new geographic path generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.geoPath-创建一个新的地理路径生成器。

trans-unit.source: d3.geoRotation - create a rotation function for the specified angles.
d3.geoStream - convert a GeoJSON object to a geometry stream.
d3.geoTransverseMercatorRaw - the raw transverse spherical Mercator projection.
graticule.extent - get or set the major & minor extents.
trans-unit.target: 经纬网 .extent -获取或设置主要和次要程度。

trans-unit.source: graticule.extentMajor - get or set the major extent.
trans-unit.target: 经纬网 .extentMajor -获取或设置的主要范围。

trans-unit.source: graticule.extentMinor - get or set the minor extent.
trans-unit.target: 经纬网 .extentMinor -获取或设置较小的程度。

trans-unit.source: graticule.lines - generate an array of LineStrings of meridians and parallels.
trans-unit.target: graticule .lines-生成子午线和平行线的LineString数组。

trans-unit.source: graticule.outline - generate a Polygon of the graticule’s extent.
trans-unit.target: 经纬网 .outline -生成刻度的程度的多边形。

trans-unit.source: graticule.precision - get or set the latitudinal precision.
graticule.step - get or set the major & minor step intervals.
trans-unit.target: graticule .step-获取或设置主要和次要间隔时间。

trans-unit.source: graticule.stepMajor - get or set the major step intervals.
trans-unit.target: 经纬网 .stepMajor -获取或设置大步间隔。

trans-unit.source: graticule.stepMinor - get or set the minor step intervals.
trans-unit.target: 经纬网 .stepMinor -获取或设置小步间隔。

trans-unit.source: path.area - compute the projected planar area of a given feature.
trans-unit.target: path .area-计算给定要素的投影平面面积。

trans-unit.source: path.bounds - compute the projected planar bounding box of a given feature.
trans-unit.target: path .bounds-计算给定要素的投影平面边界框。

trans-unit.source: path.centroid - compute the projected planar centroid of a given feature.
trans-unit.target: path .centroid-计算给定特征的投影平面质心。

trans-unit.source: path.measure - compute the projected planar length of a given feature.
trans-unit.target: path .measure-计算给定特征的投影平面长度。

trans-unit.source: path.pointRadius - set the radius to display point features.
project.invert - unproject the specified point from the plane to the sphere.
trans-unit.target: project .invert-将指定点从平面取消投影到球体。

trans-unit.source: projection.postclip - set the planar clipping stream transform.
projection.preclip - set the spherical clipping stream transform.
projection.clipAngle - set the radius of the clip circle.
projection.clipExtent - set the viewport clip extent, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: projection .clipExtent-设置视口剪辑范围，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: projection.fitExtent - set the scale and translate to fit a GeoJSON object.
trans-unit.target: projection .fitExtent-设置比例并转换以适合GeoJSON对象。

trans-unit.source: projection.fitHeight - set the scale and translate to fit a GeoJSON object.
trans-unit.target: projection .fitHeight-设置比例并转换以适合GeoJSON对象。

trans-unit.source: projection.fitSize - set the scale and translate to fit a GeoJSON object.
trans-unit.target: projection .fitSize-设置比例并转换以适合GeoJSON对象。

trans-unit.source: projection.fitWidth - set the scale and translate to fit a GeoJSON object.
trans-unit.target: projection .fitWidth-设置比例并转换以适合GeoJSON对象。

trans-unit.source: projection.invert - unproject the specified point from the plane to the sphere.
trans-unit.target: projection .invert-将指定点从平面投影到球体。

trans-unit.source: projection.precision - set the precision threshold for adaptive sampling.
trans-unit.target: projection .precision-设置自适应采样的精度阈值。

trans-unit.source: projection.rotate - set the three-axis spherical rotation angles.
projection.stream - wrap the specified stream to project geometry.
trans-unit.target: projection .stream-将指定的流包装为投影几何体。

trans-unit.source: rotation.invert - unrotate the given point around the sphere.
stream.lineEnd - indicates the end of a line or ring.
stream.lineStart - indicates the start of a line or ring.
stream.point - indicates a point with the specified coordinates.
stream.polygonEnd - indicates the end of a polygon.
stream.polygonStart - indicates the start of a polygon.
cluster - layout the specified hierarchy in a dendrogram.
trans-unit.target: 集群 -布局树形图指定的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: pack - layout the specified hierarchy using circle-packing.
trans-unit.target: pack-使用圆形包装布置指定的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: partition - layout the specified hierarchy as a partition diagram.
trans-unit.target: partition-将指定的层次结构布局为分区图。

trans-unit.source: stratify - construct a root node from tabular data.
trans-unit.target: 分层 -根据表格数据构建根节点。

trans-unit.source: tree - layout the specified hierarchy in a tidy tree.
trans-unit.target: 树 -布局整齐树指定的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: treemap - layout the specified hierarchy as a treemap.
trans-unit.target: treemap-将指定的层次结构布置为树图。

trans-unit.source: d3.hierarchy - constructs a root node from hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: d3.hierarchy-从分层数据构造一个根节点。

trans-unit.source: node.path - generate the shortest path to another node.
trans-unit.target: node .path-生成到另一个节点的最短路径。
节点 .sum-评估并汇总定量值。

trans-unit.source: d3.pack - create a new circle-packing layout.
d3.packEnclose - enclose the specified array of circles.
d3.packSiblings - pack the specified array of circles.
d3.partition - create a new partition (icicle or sunburst) layout.
trans-unit.target: d3.partition-创建一个新的分区（冰柱或森伯斯特）布局。

trans-unit.source: partition.round - set whether the output coordinates are rounded.
squarify.ratio - set the desired rectangle aspect ratio.
stratify.parentId - set the parent node id accessor.
d3.tree - create a new tidy tree layout.
trans-unit.target: d3.tree-创建一个新的整齐的树布局。

trans-unit.source: d3.treemapBinary - tile using a balanced binary tree.
d3.treemapResquarify - like d3.treemapSquarify, but performs stable updates.
d3.treemapSquarify - tile using squarified rows per Bruls et. al.
trans-unit.target: d3.treemapSquarify-根据Bruls 等使用平方行进行平铺 等

trans-unit.source: treemap.paddingBottom - set the padding between the parent’s bottom edge and children.
trans-unit.target: treemap .paddingBottom-设置父级的底边和子级之间的填充。

trans-unit.source: treemap.paddingLeft - set the padding between the parent’s left edge and children.
trans-unit.target: treemap .paddingLeft-设置父级的左边缘和子级之间的填充。

trans-unit.source: treemap.paddingOuter - set the padding between parent and children.
trans-unit.target: treemap .paddingOuter-设置父级和子级之间的填充。

trans-unit.source: treemap.paddingRight - set the padding between the parent’s right edge and children.
trans-unit.target: treemap .paddingRight-设置父级的右边缘和子级之间的填充。

trans-unit.source: treemap.paddingTop - set the padding between the parent’s top edge and children.
trans-unit.target: treemap .paddingTop-设置父级的上边缘和子级之间的填充。

trans-unit.source: treemap.round - set whether the output coordinates are rounded.
d3.interpolateBasis - generate a B-spline through a set of values.
d3.interpolateBasisClosed - generate a closed B-spline through a set of values.
trans-unit.target: d3.interpolateBasisClosed-通过一组值生成闭合的B样条曲线。

trans-unit.source: d3.interpolateCubehelixLong - interpolate Cubehelix colors, the long way.
trans-unit.target: d3.interpolateCubehelixLo​​ng-对 Cubehelix颜色进行插值，方法很长。

trans-unit.source: d3.interpolateDiscrete - generate a discrete interpolator from a set of values.
d3.interpolateHclLong - interpolate HCL colors, the long way.
d3.interpolateHslLong - interpolate HSL colors, the long way.
d3.interpolateRgbBasis - generate a B-spline through a set of colors.
d3.interpolateRgbBasisClosed - generate a closed B-spline through a set of colors.
trans-unit.target: d3.interpolateRgbBasisClosed-通过一组颜色生成闭合的B样条。
d3.interpolateString-插入具有嵌入式数字的字符串。

trans-unit.source: d3.interpolateZoom - zoom and pan between two views.
trans-unit.target: d3.interpolateZoom-在两个视图之间缩放和平移。
插值 .gamma-在插值期间应用伽玛校正。

trans-unit.source: d3.piecewise - generate a piecewise linear interpolator from a set of values.
trans-unit.target: d3.piecewise-从一组值生成分段线性插值器。

trans-unit.source: d3.quantize - generate uniformly-spaced samples from an interpolator.
trans-unit.target: d3.quantize-从插值器生成均匀间隔的样本。

trans-unit.source: d3.path - create a new path serializer.
trans-unit.target: d3.path-创建一个新的路径序列化器。

trans-unit.source: path.toString - serialize to an SVG path data string.
d3.polygonArea - compute the area of the given polygon.
d3.polygonCentroid - compute the centroid of the given polygon.
d3.polygonContains - test whether a point is inside a polygon.
d3.polygonHull - compute the convex hull of the given points.
d3.polygonLength - compute the length of the given polygon’s perimeter.
trans-unit.target: d3.polygonLength-计算给定多边形周长的长度。

trans-unit.source: quadtree.add - add a datum to a quadtree.
quadtree.addAll - add an array of data to a quadtree.
quadtree.copy - create a copy of a quadtree.
quadtree.cover - extend the quadtree to cover a point.
quadtree.data - retrieve all data from the quadtree.
quadtree.extent - extend the quadtree to cover an extent.
trans-unit.target: quadtree .extent-扩展四叉树以覆盖一个范围。

trans-unit.source: quadtree.find - quickly find the closest datum in a quadtree.
trans-unit.target: quadtree .find-快速找到四叉树中最接近的基准。

trans-unit.source: quadtree.remove - remove a datum from a quadtree.
quadtree.removeAll - remove an array of data from a quadtree.
quadtree.size - count the number of data in the quadtree.
quadtree.visit - selectively visit nodes in a quadtree.
trans-unit.target: quadtree .visit-有选择地访问四叉树中的节点。

trans-unit.source: quadtree.visitAfter - visit all nodes in a quadtree.
band - compute the band start corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: band-计算与给定域值相对应的波段起点。

trans-unit.source: continuous - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: 连续 -计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: log - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: log-计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: ordinal - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: 序数 -计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: point - compute the point corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: 点 -计算对应于给定域值的点。

trans-unit.source: pow - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: pow-计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: quantile - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: 分位数 -计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: quantize - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: 量化 -计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: threshold - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: 阈值 -计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: time - compute the range value corresponding to a given domain value.
trans-unit.target: 时间 -计算与给定域值相对应的范围值。

trans-unit.source: band.align - set band alignment, if there is extra space.
trans-unit.target: band .align-如果有多余的空间，则设置频段对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: band.bandwidth - get the width of each band.
band.copy - create a copy of this scale.
band.padding - set padding outside and between bands.
trans-unit.target: band .padding-设置频段外部和频段之间的填充。

trans-unit.source: band.paddingOuter - set padding outside the first and last bands.
trans-unit.target: band .paddingOuter-在第一个和最后一个波段之外设置填充。

trans-unit.source: band.rangeRound - set the output range and enable rounding.
band.step - get the distance between the starts of adjacent bands.
trans-unit.target: band .step-获取相邻频段起点之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: continuous.clamp - enable clamping to the domain or range.
continuous.copy - create a copy of this scale.
continuous.invert - compute the domain value corresponding to a given range value.
trans-unit.target: 连续 .invert-计算与给定范围值相对应的域值。

trans-unit.source: continuous.nice - extend the domain to nice round numbers.
trans-unit.target: 连续 .nice-将域扩展为漂亮的整数。

trans-unit.source: continuous.rangeRound - set the output range and enable rounding.

trans-unit.target: 连续的 .tickFormat-供人类使用的格式刻度。

trans-unit.source: continuous.ticks - compute representative values from the domain.
log.clamp - enable clamping to the domain or range.
log.copy - create a copy of this scale.
log.invert - compute the domain value corresponding to a given range value.
trans-unit.target: log .invert-计算与给定范围值相对应的域值。

trans-unit.source: log.nice - extend the domain to nice round numbers.
trans-unit.target: log .nice-将域扩展为漂亮的整数。

trans-unit.source: log.rangeRound - set the output range and enable rounding.
log.ticks - compute representative values from the domain.
ordinal.copy - create a copy of this scale.
ordinal.unknown - set the output value for unknown inputs.
trans-unit.target: 顺序 .unknown-设置未知输入的输出值。

trans-unit.source: point.align - set point alignment, if there is extra space.
trans-unit.target: point .align-如果有多余空间，则设置点对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: point.copy - create a copy of this scale.
point.padding - set padding outside the first and last point.
trans-unit.target: point .padding-在第一个和最后一个点之外设置填充。

trans-unit.source: point.rangeRound - set the output range and enable rounding.
point.step - get the distance between the starts of adjacent points.
trans-unit.target: point .step-获取相邻点的起点之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: pow.clamp - enable clamping to the domain or range.
trans-unit.target: pow .clamp-启用对域或范围的夹持。

trans-unit.source: pow.copy - create a copy of this scale.
pow.invert - compute the domain value corresponding to a given range value.
trans-unit.target: pow .invert-计算与给定范围值相对应的域值。

trans-unit.source: pow.nice - extend the domain to nice round numbers.
trans-unit.target: pow .nice-将域扩展为漂亮的整数。

trans-unit.source: pow.rangeRound - set the output range and enable rounding.
pow.ticks - compute representative values from the domain.
quantile.copy - create a copy of this scale.
quantile.invertExtent - compute the domain values corresponding to a given range value.
trans-unit.target: 分位数 .invertExtent-计算与给定范围值相对应的域值。

trans-unit.source: quantize.copy - create a copy of this scale.
trans-unit.target: 量化 .copy-创建此比例尺的副本。

trans-unit.source: quantize.invertExtent - compute the domain values corresponding to a given range value.
trans-unit.target: 量化 .invertExtent-计算与给定范围值相对应的域值。

trans-unit.source: quantize.nice - extend the domain to nice round numbers.
trans-unit.target: 量化 .nice-将域扩展为漂亮的整数。
量化 .tickFormat-格式化刻度以供人类消费。

trans-unit.source: quantize.ticks - compute representative values from the domain.
d3.scaleImplicit - a special unknown value for implicit domains.
d3.scaleLog - create a quantitative logarithmic scale.
d3.scalePow - create a quantitative power scale.
d3.scaleQuantile - create a quantile quantizing linear scale.
d3.scaleQuantize - create a uniform quantizing linear scale.
d3.scaleSqrt - create a quantitative power scale with exponent 0.5.
trans-unit.target: d3.scaleSqrt-创建指数为0.5的定量功率标度。

trans-unit.source: d3.scaleThreshold - create an arbitrary quantizing linear scale.
trans-unit.target: d3.scaleThreshold-创建一个任意的量化线性比例。

trans-unit.source: d3.scaleTime - create a linear scale for time.
d3.scaleUtc - create a linear scale for UTC.

trans-unit.target: 顺序 .interpolator-设置比例尺的输出插值器。

trans-unit.source: threshold.copy - create a copy of this scale.
threshold.invertExtent - compute the domain values corresponding to a given range value.
trans-unit.target: threshold .invertExtent-计算与给定范围值相对应的域值。

trans-unit.source: time.clamp - enable clamping to the domain or range.
trans-unit.target: time .clamp-启用对域或范围的钳位。

trans-unit.source: time.copy - create a copy of this scale.
time.invert - compute the domain value corresponding to a given range value.
trans-unit.target: time .invert-计算与给定范围值相对应的域值。

trans-unit.source: time.nice - extend the domain to nice round times.
trans-unit.target: time .nice-将域扩展为良好的舍入时间。

trans-unit.source: time.rangeRound - set the output range and enable rounding.
time.ticks - compute representative values from the domain.
trans-unit.target: 时间 .ticks-从域中计算代表值。

trans-unit.source: d3.clientPoint - get a position relative to a given container.
trans-unit.target: d3.clientPoint-获取相对于给定容器的位置。

trans-unit.source: d3.create - create and select a detached element.
trans-unit.target: d3.create-创建并选择一个分离的元素。

trans-unit.source: d3.event - the current user event, during interaction.
d3.local - declares a new local variable.
local.toString - get the property identifier of a local variable.
trans-unit.target: local .toString-获取局部变量的属性标识符。

trans-unit.source: d3.matcher - test whether an element matches a selector.
trans-unit.target: d3.matcher-测试元素是否与选择器匹配。

trans-unit.source: d3.mouse - get the mouse position relative to a given container.
trans-unit.target: d3.mouse-获取鼠标相对于给定容器的位置。

trans-unit.source: d3.namespace - qualify a prefixed XML name, such as “xlink:href”.
d3.select - select an element from the document.
d3.selectAll - select multiple elements from the document.
selection.append - create, append and select new elements.
selection.call - call a function with this selection.
selection.classed - get, add or remove CSS classes.
selection.data accepts iterables directly, meaning that you can use a Map (or Set or other iterable) to perform a data join without first needing to convert to an array.
trans-unit.target: selection .data直接接受可迭代对象，这意味着您可以使用Map（或Set或其他可迭代对象）执行数据联接，而无需先转换为数组。

trans-unit.source: selection.datum - get or set element data (without joining).
trans-unit.target: selection .datum-获取或设置元素数据（无联接）。

trans-unit.source: selection.each - call a function for each element.
trans-unit.target: 选择 .each-为每个元素调用一个函数。

trans-unit.source: selection.empty - returns true if this selection is empty.
selection.enter - get the enter selection (data missing elements).
trans-unit.target: selection .enter-获取回车选择（数据丢失元素）。

trans-unit.source: selection.exit - get the exit selection (elements missing data).
trans-unit.target: selection .exit-获取退出选择（元素缺失数据）。

trans-unit.source: selection.html - get or set the inner HTML.
selection.insert - create, insert and select new elements.
selection.lower - reorders each element as the first child of its parent.
trans-unit.target: selection .lower-将每个元素重新排序为其父级的第一个子级。

trans-unit.source: selection.nodes - returns an array of all selected elements.

trans-unit.target: 选择 .on-添加或删除事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: selection.order - reorders elements in the document to match the selection.
trans-unit.target: selection .order-重新排序文档中的元素以匹配选择。

trans-unit.source: selection.raise - reorders each element as the last child of its parent.
trans-unit.target: selection .raise-将每个元素重新排序为其父元素的最后一个子元素。

trans-unit.source: selection.select - select a descendant element for each selected element.
trans-unit.target: selection .select-为每个选定元素选择一个后代元素。

trans-unit.source: selection.selectAll - select multiple descendants for each selected element.
trans-unit.target: selection .selectAll-为每个选定元素选择多个后代。

trans-unit.source: selection.sort - sort elements in the document based on data.
trans-unit.target: selection .sort-根据数据对文档中的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: selection.style - get or set a style property.
selection.text - get or set the text content.
d3.style - get a node’s current style value.
d3.touch - get a touch position relative to a given container.
trans-unit.target: d3.touch-获取相对于给定容器的触摸位置。

trans-unit.source: d3.touches - get the touch positions relative to a given container.
trans-unit.target: d3.touches-获得相对于给定容器的触摸位置。

trans-unit.source: d3.window - get a node’s owner window.
arc - generate an arc for the given datum.
area - generate an area for the given dataset.
trans-unit.target: area-为给定的数据集生成一个区域。

trans-unit.source: line - generate a line for the given dataset.
trans-unit.target: line-为给定的数据集生成一条线。

trans-unit.source: pie - compute the arc angles for the given dataset.
radialArea - generate an area for the given dataset.
trans-unit.target: radiusArea-为给定的数据集生成一个区域。

trans-unit.source: radialLine - generate a line for the given dataset.
trans-unit.target: radiusLine-为给定的数据集生成一条线。

trans-unit.source: stack - generate a stack for the given dataset.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈 -为给定的数据集生成堆栈。

trans-unit.source: symbol - generate a symbol for the given datum.
trans-unit.target: symbol-为给定的基准生成一个符号。

trans-unit.source: d3.arc - create a new arc generator.
arc.cornerRadius - set the corner radius, for rounded corners.
arc.padAngle - set the angle between adjacent arcs, for padded arcs.
trans-unit.target: arc .padAngle-设置相邻圆弧之间的夹角。

trans-unit.source: arc.padRadius - set the radius at which to linearize padding.
d3.area - create a new area generator.
radialArea.lineEndAngle - derive a line for the end edge of an area.
trans-unit.target: radiusArea .lineEndAngle-为区域的末端边缘生成一条线。

trans-unit.source: radialArea.lineInnerRadius - derive a line for the inner edge of an area.
radialArea.lineOuterRadius - derive a line for the outer edge of an area.
radialArea.lineStartAngle - derive a line for the start edge of an area.
trans-unit.target: radiusArea .lineStartAngle-为区域的起始边缘导出一条线。

trans-unit.source: area.lineX0 - derive a line for the left edge of an area.
trans-unit.target: area .lineX0-为区域的左边缘导出一条线。

trans-unit.source: area.lineX1 - derive a line for the right edge of an area.
trans-unit.target: area .lineX1-为区域的右边缘导出一条线。

trans-unit.source: area.lineY0 - derive a line for the top edge of an area.
trans-unit.target: area .lineY0-导出区域顶部边缘的线。

trans-unit.source: area.lineY1 - derive a line for the bottom edge of an area.
trans-unit.target: area .lineY1-得出区域底部边缘的线。
.x 区域 -设置 x0和 x1访问器。
区域 .x0-设置基线 x访问器。
区域 .y-设置 y0和 y1访问器。
区域 .y0-设置基线 y访问器。
区域 .y1-设置顶线 y访问器。

trans-unit.source: d3.curveBasis - a cubic basis spline, repeating the end points.
d3.curveCardinal - a cubic cardinal spline, with one-sided difference at each end.
trans-unit.target: d3.curveCardinal-三次基数样条，两端各有一个侧面差异。

trans-unit.source: d3.curveCatmullRom - a cubic Catmull–Rom spline, with one-sided difference at each end.
trans-unit.target: d3.curveCatmullRom-三次Catmull-Rom样条，在两端各有一个侧面差异。

trans-unit.source: d3.curveMonotoneX - a cubic spline that, given monotonicity in x, preserves it in y.
trans-unit.target: d3.curveMonotoneX-三次样条，给定x单调性，将其保留在y中。

trans-unit.source: d3.curveMonotoneY - a cubic spline that, given monotonicity in y, preserves it in x.
trans-unit.target: d3.curveMonotoneY-三次样条，给定y中的单调性，并将其保留在x中。

trans-unit.source: curve.point - add a point to the current line segment.
d3.line - create a new line generator.
d3.linkHorizontal - create a new horizontal link generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.linkHorizo​​ntal-创建一个新的水平链接生成器。

trans-unit.source: d3.linkRadial - create a new radial link generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.linkRadial-创建一个新的径向链接生成器。

trans-unit.source: d3.linkVertical - create a new vertical link generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.linkVertical-创建一个新的垂直链接生成器。

trans-unit.source: d3.pie - create a new pie generator.
pie.padAngle - set the pad angle between adjacent arcs.
trans-unit.target: pie .padAngle-设置相邻弧之间的垫角。

trans-unit.source: d3.radialArea - create a new radial area generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.radialArea-创建一个新的径向面积生成器。

trans-unit.source: radialArea.angle - set the start and end angle accessors.
trans-unit.target: radiusArea .angle-设置开始和结束角度访问器。

trans-unit.source: radialArea.radius - set the inner and outer radius accessors.
d3.radialLine - create a new radial line generator.
trans-unit.target: d3.radialLine-创建一个新的径向线生成器。

trans-unit.source: d3.stack - create a new stack generator.
d3.stackOffsetDiverging - positive above zero; negative below zero.
trans-unit.target: d3.stackOffsetDiverging-大于零的正数；零以下的负数。

trans-unit.source: d3.stackOffsetExpand - normalize the baseline to zero and topline to one.
trans-unit.target: d3.stackOffsetExpand-将基线标准化为零，并将轮廓线标准化为一。

trans-unit.source: d3.stackOrderAscending - put the smallest series on bottom.
d3.stackOrderDescending - put the largest series on bottom.
d3.stackOrderInsideOut - put larger series in the middle.
d3.stackOrderReverse - use the reverse of the given series order.
trans-unit.target: d3.stackOrderReverse-使用给定系列顺序的相反顺序。

trans-unit.source: d3.symbol - create a new symbol generator.
d3.symbolCross - a Greek cross with arms of equal length.
symbolType.draw - draw this symbol to the given context.
trans-unit.target: symbolType .draw-将此符号绘制到给定的上下文。

trans-unit.source: symbol.size - set the size of the symbol in square pixels.
trans-unit.target: symbol .size-以正方形像素为单位设置符号的大小。

trans-unit.source: d3.symbols - the array of built-in symbol types.
interval.ceil - round up to the nearest boundary.
interval.count - count interval boundaries between two dates.
trans-unit.target: interval .count-计算两个日期之间的间隔边界。

trans-unit.source: interval.every - create a filtered subset of this interval.
trans-unit.target: interval .every-创建此时间间隔的过滤子集。

trans-unit.source: interval.filter - create a filtered subset of this interval.
trans-unit.target: interval .filter-创建此时间间隔的过滤子集。

trans-unit.source: interval.floor - round down to the nearest boundary.
interval.offset - offset a date by some number of intervals.
trans-unit.target: interval .offset-将日期偏移一定数量的间隔。

trans-unit.source: interval.range - generate a range of dates at interval boundaries.
trans-unit.target: interval .range-在间隔边界处生成日期范围。

trans-unit.source: d3.timeFriday, d3.utcFriday - the week interval, starting on Friday.
d3.timeInterval - implement a new custom time interval.
d3.timeMonday, d3.utcMonday - the week interval, starting on Monday.
d3.timeSaturday, d3.utcSaturday - the week interval, starting on Saturday.
d3.timeSunday, d3.utcSunday - the week interval, starting on Sunday.
d3.timeThursday, d3.utcThursday - the week interval, starting on Thursday.
d3.timeTuesday, d3.utcTuesday - the week interval, starting on Tuesday.
d3.timeWednesday, d3.utcWednesday - the week interval, starting on Wednesday.
d3.timeFormat - alias for locale.format on the default locale.
d3.timeParse - alias for locale.parse on the default locale.
trans-unit.target: d3.timeParse-默认语言环境中的 .parse 语言环境的别名。

trans-unit.source: d3.utcFormat - alias for locale.utcFormat on the default locale.
trans-unit.target: d3.utcFormat-默认语言环境中的 .utcFormat 语言环境的别名。

trans-unit.source: d3.utcParse - alias for locale.utcParse on the default locale.
trans-unit.target: d3.utcParse-默认语言环境中的 .utcParse 语言环境的别名。

trans-unit.source: d3.interval - schedule a timer that is called with a configurable period.
trans-unit.target: d3.interval-安排一个计时器，该计时器以可配置的周期进行调用。

trans-unit.source: d3.now - get the current high-resolution time.
d3.timeout - schedule a timer that stops on its first callback.
trans-unit.target: d3.timeout-安排一个计时器，该计时器在其第一个回调中停止。
